title: Frame rate stuttering spikes today/since Patch 6.15?
body:
Is there an issue with the patch or the servers today? My comp is more than good enough to run the game and I've never before had any frame rate issues besides for 1/2 of a second when I turn on DJ Sona music at the start of a game.

Today, my first time playing since 6.15, I've been having issues several times each game with sudden frame rate stuttering that lasts for a second or two. Like, the game's running perfectly fine for a minute, then two seconds of stuttering, then back to perfectly fine again.

I tried restarting my computer, and I don't have any unusual programs running in the background. Any idea how to tell if this is a me issue or a game issue?

replies.body: It sounds like there may be an issue with your drivers or game files that's causing the game to not render properly, and cause this stuttering.  I agree with DTN that the[ FPS Issues](http://fps) guide can prove beneficial to you!  Let us know if you have any issues afterwards!
I suggest visiting the [FPS Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting#section-windows) and performing the steps listed.
